00029 #include <mrpt/slam.h>
00030 #include <mrpt/hwdrivers/CSickLaserSerial.h>
00031 #include <mrpt/hwdrivers/CSickLaserUSB.h>
00032 #include <mrpt/gui.h>
00033 
00034 using namespace mrpt;
00035 using namespace mrpt::utils;
00036 using namespace mrpt::slam;
00037 using namespace mrpt::gui;
00038 using namespace mrpt::opengl;
00039 using namespace mrpt::hwdrivers;
00040 using namespace std;
00041 
00042 
00043 string SERIAL_NAME;     // Name of the serial port to open
00044 
00045 // ------------------------------------------------------
00046 //                              Test_PLS
00047 // ------------------------------------------------------
00048 void TestPLS()
00049 {
00050         CSickLaserSerial        laser;
00051 
00052         cout << "SICK LMS thru serial port test application." << endl << endl;
00053 
00054         if (SERIAL_NAME.empty())
00055         {
00056         cout << "Enter the serial port name (e.g. COM1, ttyS0, ttyUSB0, ttyACM0): ";
00057         getline(cin,SERIAL_NAME);
00058         }
00059         else
00060         {
00061         cout << "Using serial port: " << SERIAL_NAME << endl;
00062         }
00063 
00064         laser.setSerialPort(SERIAL_NAME);
00065 
00066 #if 1
00067         //laser.setBaudRate(500000);
00068         laser.setBaudRate(38400);
00069         laser.setScanFOV(180);
00070         laser.setScanResolution(50);  // 25=0.25deg, 50=0.5deg, 100=1deg
00071         //laser.setMillimeterMode(true);
00072 #endif
00073 
00074 
00075 #if MRPT_HAS_WXWIDGETS
00076         CDisplayWindowPlots             win("Laser scans");
00077 #endif
00078 
00079         // Load config:
00080         //laser.loadConfig( CConfigFile( "./LASER_SCAN_TEST.ini") ,"LIDAR" );
00081 
00082         cout << "Trying to initialize the laser..." << endl;
00083         laser.initialize(); // This will raise an exception on error
00084         cout << "Initialized OK!" << endl;
00085 
00086         while (!mrpt::system::os::kbhit())
00087         {
00088                 bool                                            thereIsObservation,hardError;
00089                 CObservation2DRangeScan         obs;
00090 
00091                 try
00092                 {
00093                         laser.doProcessSimple( thereIsObservation, obs, hardError );
00094                 }
00095                 catch (std::exception &e)
00096                 {
00097                         cerr << e.what() << endl;
00098                         hardError = true;
00099                 }
00100 
00101                 if (hardError)
00102                         printf("[TEST] Hardware error=true!!\n");
00103 
00104                 if (thereIsObservation)
00105                 {
00106                         printf("[TEST] Observation received (%u ranges over %.02fdeg, mid=%.03f)!!\n",
00107                                 (unsigned int)obs.scan.size(),
00108                                 RAD2DEG(obs.aperture),
00109                                 obs.scan[obs.scan.size()/2]);
00110 
00111                         obs.sensorPose = CPose3D(0,0,0);
00112                         mrpt::slam::CSimplePointsMap            theMap;
00113                         theMap.insertionOptions.minDistBetweenLaserPoints       = 0;
00114                         theMap.insertObservation( &obs );
00115 
00116 #if MRPT_HAS_WXWIDGETS
00117                         vector_float    xs,ys,zs;
00118                         theMap.getAllPoints(xs,ys,zs);
00119                         win.plot(xs,ys,".b3");
00120                         win.axis_equal();
00121 #endif
00122                 }
00123                 mrpt::system::sleep(15);
00124         };
00125 
00126         laser.turnOff();
00127 }
00128 
00129 int main(int argc, char **argv)
00130 {
00131         try
00132         {
00133             if (argc>1)
00134         {
00135             SERIAL_NAME = string(argv[1]);
00136         }
00137 
00138                 TestPLS();
00139                 return 0;
00140 
00141         } catch (std::exception &e)
00142         {
00143                 std::cout << "EXCEPCION: " << e.what() << std::endl;
00144                 return -1;
00145         }
00146         catch (...)
00147         {
00148                 printf("Another exception!!");
00149                 return -1;
00150         }
00151 
00152 }
